title: 新约 - 路加福音(Luke) - 第 23 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 路加福音(Luke) -- 第 23 章 ( 本篇共有 24 章 )

lineList.en: And the whole multitude of them arose, and led him unto Pilate.
lineList.cn: 众人都起来，把耶稣解到彼拉多面前。

lineList.en: And they began to accuse him, saying, We found this fellow perverting the nation, and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar, saying that he himself is Christ a King.
lineList.cn: 就告他说，我们见这人诱惑国民，禁止纳税给凯撒，并说自己是基督，是王。

lineList.en: And Pilate asked him, saying, Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answered him and said, Thou sayest it.
lineList.cn: 彼拉多问耶稣说，你是犹太人的王吗。耶稣回答说，你说的是。

lineList.en: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people, I find no fault in this man.
lineList.cn: 彼拉多对祭司长和众人说，我查不出这人有什么罪来。

lineList.en: And they were the more fierce, saying, He stirreth up the people, teaching throughout all Jewry, beginning from Galilee to this place.
lineList.cn: 但他们越发极力的说，他煽惑百姓，在犹太遍地传道，从加利利起，直到这里了。

lineList.en: When Pilate heard of Galilee, he asked whether the man were a Galilaean.
lineList.cn: 彼拉多一听见，就问这人是加利利人吗。

lineList.en: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod's jurisdiction, he sent him to Herod, who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time.
lineList.cn: 既晓得耶稣属希律所管，就把他送到希律那里去。那时希律正在耶路撒冷。

lineList.en: And when Herod saw Jesus, he was exceeding glad: for he was desirous to see him of a long season, because he had heard many things of him; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him.
lineList.cn: 希律看见耶稣，就很欢喜。因为听见过他的事，久已想要见他。并且指望看他行一件神迹。

lineList.en: Then he questioned with him in many words; but he answered him nothing.
lineList.cn: 于是问他许多的话。耶稣却一言不答。

lineList.en: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him.
lineList.cn: 祭司长和文士，都站着极力的告他。

lineList.en: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought, and mocked him, and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe, and sent him again to Pilate.
lineList.cn: 希律和他的兵丁就藐视耶稣，戏弄他，给他穿上华丽衣服，把他送回彼拉多那里去。

lineList.en: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together: for before they were at enmity between themselves.
lineList.cn: 从前希律和彼拉多彼此有仇。在那一天就成了朋友。

lineList.en: And Pilate, when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people,
lineList.cn: 彼拉多传齐了祭司长，和官府，并百姓，

lineList.en: Said unto them, Ye have brought this man unto me, as one that perverteth the people: and, behold, I, having examined him before you, have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him:
lineList.cn: 就对他们说，你们解这人到我这里，说他是诱惑百姓的。看哪，我也曾将你们告他的事，在你们面前审问他，并没有查出他什么罪来。

lineList.en: No, nor yet Herod: for I sent you to him; and, lo, nothing worthy of death is done unto him.
lineList.cn: 就是希律也是如此，所以把他送回来。可见他没有作什么该死的事。

lineList.en: I will therefore chastise him, and release him.
lineList.cn: 故此我要责打他，把他释放了。有古卷在此有

lineList.en: (For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast.)
lineList.cn: 每逢这节期巡抚必须释放一个囚犯给他们

lineList.en: And they cried out all at once, saying, Away with this man, and release unto us Barabbas:
lineList.cn: 众人却一齐喊着说，除掉这个人，释放巴拉巴给我们。

lineList.en: (Who for a certain sedition made in the city, and for murder, was cast into prison.)
lineList.cn: 这巴拉巴是因在城里作乱杀人下在监里的。

lineList.en: Pilate therefore, willing to release Jesus, spake again to them.
lineList.cn: 彼拉多愿意释放耶稣，就又劝解他们。

lineList.en: But they cried, saying, Crucify him, crucify him.
lineList.cn: 无奈他们喊着说，钉他十字架，钉他十字架

lineList.en: And he said unto them the third time, Why, what evil hath he done? I have found no cause of death in him: I will therefore chastise him, and let him go.
lineList.cn: 彼拉多第三次对他们说，为什么呢，这人作了什么恶事呢，我并没有查出他什么该死的罪来。所以我要责打他，把他释放了。

lineList.en: And they were instant with loud voices, requiring that he might be crucified. And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed.
lineList.cn: 他们大声催逼彼拉多，求他把耶稣钉在十字架上。他们的声音就得了胜，

lineList.en: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required.
lineList.cn: 彼拉多这才照他们所求的定案。

lineList.en: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison, whom they had desired; but he delivered Jesus to their will.
lineList.cn: 把他们所求的那作乱杀人下在监里的，释放了。把耶稣交给他们，任凭他们的意思行。

lineList.en: And as they led him away, they laid hold upon one Simon, a Cyrenian, coming out of the country, and on him they laid the cross, that he might bear it after Jesus.
lineList.cn: 带耶稣去的时候，有一个古利奈人西门，从乡下来。他们就抓住他，把十字架搁在他身上，叫他背着跟随耶稣。

lineList.en: And there followed him a great company of people, and of women, which also bewailed and lamented him.
lineList.cn: 有许多百姓，跟随耶稣，内中有好些妇女，妇女们为他号？？痛哭。

lineList.en: But Jesus turning unto them said, Daughters of Jerusalem, weep not for me, but weep for yourselves, and for your children.
lineList.cn: 耶稣转身对他们说，耶路撒冷的女子，不要为我哭，当为自己和自己的儿女哭。

lineList.en: For, behold, the days are coming, in the which they shall say, Blessed are the barren, and the wombs that never bare, and the paps which never gave suck.
lineList.cn: 因为日子要到，人必说，不生育的，和未会怀胎的，未曾乳养婴孩的，有福了。

lineList.en: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains, Fall on us; and to the hills, Cover us.
lineList.cn: 那时，人要向大山说，倒在我们身上。向小山说，遮盖我们。

lineList.en: For if they do these things in a green tree, what shall be done in the dry?
lineList.cn: 这些事既行在有汁水的树上，那枯乾的树，将来怎吗样呢。

lineList.en: And there were also two other, malefactors, led with him to be put to death.
lineList.cn: 又有两个犯人，和耶稣一同带来处死。

lineList.en: And when they were come to the place, which is called Calvary, there they crucified him, and the malefactors, one on the right hand, and the other on the left.
lineList.cn: 到了一个地方，名叫髑髅地，就在那里把耶稣钉在十字架上，又钉了两个犯人，一个在左边，一个在右边。

lineList.en: Then said Jesus, Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do. And they parted his raiment, and cast lots.
lineList.cn: 当下耶稣说，父阿，赦免他们。因为他们所作的，他们不晓得。兵丁就拈阄分他的衣服。

lineList.en: And the people stood beholding. And the rulers also with them derided him, saying, He saved others; let him save himself, if he be Christ, the chosen of God.
lineList.cn: 百姓站在那里观看。官府也嗤笑他说，他救了别人。他若是基督，神所拣选的，可以救自己吧。

lineList.en: And the soldiers also mocked him, coming to him, and offering him vinegar,
lineList.cn: 兵丁也戏弄他，上前拿醋送给他喝，

lineList.en: And saying, If thou be the king of the Jews, save thyself.
lineList.cn: 说，你若是犹太人的王，可以救自己吧。

lineList.en: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek, and Latin, and Hebrew, THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS.
lineList.cn: 在耶稣以上有一个牌子，有古卷在此有用希腊罗马希伯来的文字写着，这是犹太人的王。

lineList.en: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him, saying, If thou be Christ, save thyself and us.
lineList.cn: 那同钉的两个犯人，有一个讥诮他说，你不是基督吗。可以救自己和我们吧。

lineList.en: But the other answering rebuked him, saying, Dost not thou fear God, seeing thou art in the same condemnation?
lineList.cn: 那一个就应声责备他说，你既是一样受刑的，还不怕神吗。

lineList.en: And we indeed justly; for we receive the due reward of our deeds: but this man hath done nothing amiss.
lineList.cn: 我们是应该的。因为我们所受的，与我们所作的相称。但这个人没有作过一件不好的事。

lineList.en: And he said unto Jesus, Lord, remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom.
lineList.cn: 就说，耶稣阿，你得国降临的时候，求你记念我。

lineList.en: And Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, To day shalt thou be with me in paradise.
lineList.cn: 耶稣对他说，我实在告诉你，今日你要同我在乐园里了。

lineList.en: And it was about the sixth hour, and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour.
lineList.cn: 那时约有午正，遍地都黑暗了，直到申初，

lineList.en: And the sun was darkened, and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst.
lineList.cn: 日头变黑了。殿里的幔子从当中裂为两半。

lineList.en: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice, he said, Father, into thy hands I commend my spirit: and having said thus, he gave up the ghost.
lineList.cn: 耶稣大声喊着说，父阿，我将我的灵魂交在你手里。说了这话，气就断了。

lineList.en: Now when the centurion saw what was done, he glorified God, saying, Certainly this was a righteous man.
lineList.cn: 百夫长看见所成的事，就归荣耀与神说，这真是个义人。

lineList.en: And all the people that came together to that sight, beholding the things which were done, smote their breasts, and returned.
lineList.cn: 聚集观看的众人，见了这所成的事，都捶着胸回去了。

lineList.en: And all his acquaintance, and the women that followed him from Galilee, stood afar off, beholding these things.
lineList.cn: 还有一切与耶稣熟识的人，和从加利利跟着他来的妇女们，都远远的站着，看着这些事。

lineList.en: And, behold, there was a man named Joseph, a counsellor; and he was a good man, and a just:
lineList.cn: 有一个人名叫约瑟，是个议士，为人善良公义。

lineList.en: (The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them;) he was of Arimathaea, a city of the Jews: who also himself waited for the kingdom of God.
lineList.cn: 众人所谋所为，他并没有附从。他本是犹太亚利马太城里素常盼望神国的人。

lineList.en: This man went unto Pilate, and begged the body of Jesus.
lineList.cn: 这人去见彼拉多，求耶稣的身体。

lineList.en: And he took it down, and wrapped it in linen, and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone, wherein never man before was laid.
lineList.cn: 就取下来用细麻布裹好，安放在石头凿成的坟墓里，那里头从来没有葬过人。

lineList.en: And that day was the preparation, and the sabbath drew on.
lineList.cn: 那日是豫备日，安息日也快到了。

lineList.en: And the women also, which came with him from Galilee, followed after, and beheld the sepulchre, and how his body was laid.
lineList.cn: 那些从加利利和耶稣同来的妇女，跟在后面，看见了坟墓，和他的身体怎样安放。

lineList.en: And they returned, and prepared spices and ointments; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment.
lineList.cn: 他们就回去，豫备了香料香膏。他们在安息日，便遵着诫命安息了。
